record.field: RB | Change in inventory of goods
XA | TRADE MARGIN (Sum of TA to RB)
XB | SALES REVENUES (TA + TB + TC + TD)
RC | Purchases of raw materials and related supplies
RD | Change in inventory of raw materials and related supplies
RF | Change in inventory of other supplies
XC | ADDED VALUE (XB+RA+RB) + (Sum of TE to RJ)

SYSCOHADA_Chiffres_affaires.balance + SYSCOHADA_Achats_de_marchandises.balance + SYSCOHADA_Variation_de_stocks_mar.balance + (SYSCOHADA_Produc_stck.balance + SYSCOHADA_Produc_immo.balance + SYSCOHADA_Sub_exp.balance + SYSCOHADA_Autres_prod.balance + SYSCOHADA_Transf_chrg_exp.balance + SYSCOHADA_Achats_mat_prem.balance + SYSCOHADA_Var_stocks_mp.balance + SYSCOHADA_Autres_achats.balance + SYSCOHADA_Var_stocks_autres_app.balance + SYSCOHADA_Transports.balance + SYSCOHADA_Services_ext.balance + SYSCOHADA_impots_et_taxes.balance + SYSCOHADA_Autres_charges.balance)
TJ | Reversal of depreciation, provisions and impairment
RL | Depreciation, amortization, provisions and impairment
TL | Reversals of provisions and financial depreciation
RM | Financial expenses and similar charges
RN | Allocation to provisions and financial depreciation
XF | FINANCIAL RESULT (Sum of TK to RN)
TN | Proceeds from disposal of fixed assets
RO | Book value of fixed asset disposals
XH | INCOME OUTSIDE OF ORDINARY ACTIVITIES (Sum of TN to RP)
